name: Jolyne - JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
description:
This v2 should finally work better with full body shots, but keep in mind this model is mainly thought for medium shots, portraits and closeups. JoJo faces have way too many expression lines, so SD messes up trying to simplify them. With high resolutions, it should work fine, though.

Trigger: 'Jolyne_Anime'

Optional tags: 'coat', 'pants', 'face focus', '(((pink hair)))' -> (for the "alternate pallet" effect)

Weight: [0.6 - 0.9]. Go high for a strong art style (with less flexibility), and low for creative uses or poses (and even lower for realism). With closeups, the art style should remain consistent until around 0.65.

Suggestion: Experiment with lights, colors and visual effects. Some results can be quite interesting!

Checkpoints used in examples: 'Anything V5' and 'UHD-23'

______

Example prompt:

Jolyne_anime, confident, ready to fight, creative shot, green eyes, green lips, perfect quality, (absurdres), 4k, masterpiece, lens flare, light rays, (psychedelic background), illustration, ((anime screenshot)), professional lighting, posing for viewer, ((psychedelia, face focus, wind, detailed face)) + [LoRA set to 0.65]
